object.name: giftPremiumSubscription
object.description: Gifts a Telegram Premium subscription to the given user. Returns True on success.
object.html_description: Gifts a Telegram Premium subscription to the given user. Returns True on success.
object.rst_description: Gifts a Telegram Premium subscription to the given user. Returns :code:`True` on success.

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the target user who will receive a Telegram Premium subscription
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier of the target user who will receive a Telegram Premium subscription
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the target user who will receive a Telegram Premium subscription
annotations.name: user_id

annotations.description: Number of months the Telegram Premium subscription will be active for the user; must be one of 3, 6, or 12
annotations.html_description: Number of months the Telegram Premium subscription will be active for the user; must be one of 3, 6, or 12
annotations.rst_description: Number of months the Telegram Premium subscription will be active for the user; must be one of 3, 6, or 12
annotations.name: month_count

annotations.description: Number of Telegram Stars to pay for the Telegram Premium subscription; must be 1000 for 3 months, 1500 for 6 months, and 2500 for 12 months
annotations.html_description: Number of Telegram Stars to pay for the Telegram Premium subscription; must be 1000 for 3 months, 1500 for 6 months, and 2500 for 12 months
annotations.rst_description: Number of Telegram Stars to pay for the Telegram Premium subscription; must be 1000 for 3 months, 1500 for 6 months, and 2500 for 12 months
annotations.name: star_count

annotations.description: Text that will be shown along with the service message about the subscription; 0-128 characters
annotations.html_description: Text that will be shown along with the service message about the subscription; 0-128 characters
annotations.rst_description: Text that will be shown along with the service message about the subscription; 0-128 characters
annotations.name: text

annotations.description: Mode for parsing entities in the text. See formatting options for more details. Entities other than 'bold', 'italic', 'underline', 'strikethrough', 'spoiler', and 'custom_emoji' are ignored.
annotations.html_description: Mode for parsing entities in the text. See formatting options for more details. Entities other than “bold”, “italic”, “underline”, “strikethrough”, “spoiler”, and “custom_emoji” are ignored.
annotations.rst_description: Mode for parsing entities in the text. See `formatting options <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#formatting-options>`_ for more details. Entities other than 'bold', 'italic', 'underline', 'strikethrough', 'spoiler', and 'custom_emoji' are ignored.
annotations.name: text_parse_mode

annotations.description: A JSON-serialized list of special entities that appear in the gift text. It can be specified instead of text_parse_mode. Entities other than 'bold', 'italic', 'underline', 'strikethrough', 'spoiler', and 'custom_emoji' are ignored.
annotations.html_description: A JSON-serialized list of special entities that appear in the gift text. It can be specified instead of text_parse_mode. Entities other than “bold”, “italic”, “underline”, “strikethrough”, “spoiler”, and “custom_emoji” are ignored.
annotations.rst_description: A JSON-serialized list of special entities that appear in the gift text. It can be specified instead of *text_parse_mode*. Entities other than 'bold', 'italic', 'underline', 'strikethrough', 'spoiler', and 'custom_emoji' are ignored.
annotations.name: text_entities
